Class Rule

java.lang.Object

public class Rule
extends java.lang.Object

Represents break or exception rule. Contains after break and before break patterns,

Rule

public Rule(boolean breaking,
            java.lang.String beforePattern,

Creates rule.

Parameters:
breaking - type of rule; true - break rule, false - exception rule
beforePattern - pattern matching text before break
afterPattern - pattern matching text after break
